name: BNNSPoolingLayerParameters
desc: A structure containing pooling layer parameters.DeprecatedUse BNNSLayerParametersPooling instead.

items.name: init(x_stride: Int, y_stride: Int, x_padding: Int, y_padding: Int, k_width: Int, k_height: Int, in_channels: Int, out_channels: Int, pooling_function: BNNSPoolingFunction, bias: BNNSLayerData, activation: BNNSActivation)
items.desc: Returns a new pooling layer parameters structure

items.name: init(x_stride: Int, y_stride: Int, x_padding: Int, y_padding: Int, k_width: Int, k_height: Int, in_channels: Int, out_channels: Int, pooling_function: BNNSPoolingFunction)
var bias: BNNSLayerData
items.desc: Layer bias, one for each output channel.

items.name: var k_height: Int
items.desc: The height of the convolution kernel.

items.name: var k_width: Int
items.desc: The width of the convolution kernel.

items.name: var pooling_function: BNNSPoolingFunction
items.desc: The pooling function to apply to each sample.

items.name: var x_stride: Int
items.desc: The X increment in the input image.

items.name: var y_stride: Int
items.desc: The Y increment in the input image.
